project-alpha.overview: Working on a new web application with React and Node.js backend.

entries.content: Set up the basic project structure with Create React App and Express server. Configured TypeScript for both frontend and backend.
Implemented JWT-based authentication with refresh tokens. Added login/logout functionality and protected routes.

api-design.overview: RESTful API design following OpenAPI 3.0 specification.

entries.content: Designed the main API endpoints: /auth, /users, /projects. Each follows consistent naming and response patterns.

learning-notes.overview: Collection of insights and learnings from various projects.

entries.content: Learned about React.memo and useMemo for preventing unnecessary re-renders. Significant performance improvement in list components.
